channel.title: New Xenia Artwork
channel.description: You guys like Xenia? Thought so...

item.title: 2023-08-26: happy birthday, Linux! have a Xenia!
item.description:
Due to Linux now being 32 years old (as of the 25th), Jimmy Jimmy drew Xenia, here she is!

https://twitter.com/JimmyJimmyArt/status/1695415279432442096
